titleStmt.title: Two speeches spoken in the house of the Lords, by the Lord Viscount Newarke. The first concerning the right of bishops to sit in Parliament, May 21, 1641. The second about the lawfulnes and conveniency of their intermedling in temporall affaires, May the 24th. following.
titleStmt.author: Dorchester, Henry Pierrepont, Marquis of, 1606-1680.
